        private int setUserQuery(PreparedStatement statement,
                         boolean multimediaExists,
                         boolean phonesExists,
                         User user,
                         Multimedia multimedia,
                         boolean update)
                  throws SQLException
        Secondary function used to build multimedia and phones for the user
        Parameters:
        statement - Sql sentence
        multimediaExists - To check if multimedia is already in use
        phonesExists - To check if phone is already in use
        user - User we build the query for
        multimedia - Multimedia
        Returns:
        Returns the offset of the query
        Throws:
        SQLException - Thrown if the build fails
